abstract: Sarah Maslin Nir Nocturnalist column on benefit concert at Manhattan's Town Hall for Art Start, which provides creative arts to at-risk children.
snippet: A lesson in interrupting a legend, the consequences of holding a party for a worthy cause in an enviable apartment, and a fast way to raise a lot of money.
lead_paragraph: A lesson in interrupting a legend, the consequences of holding a party for a worthy cause in an enviable apartment, and a fast way to raise a lot of money.

headline.main: Be Careful Just Whom You Decide to Interrupt
headline.print_headline: Be Careful Just Whom You Decide To Interrupt
headline.seo: Be Careful Whom You Interrupt; It May Be Bill Cosby - Nocturnalist
